chara.textHome: Ah, um, I waited up for you!
Let's go, okay?

I need to get yakisoba and ice cream
and stuff for Rena...
I could use the extra hands.
Fwaaa?!
The door swinging open scared me...
Oh, um, good morning!
Let's go out once we have breakfast, okay?

There's lots of sun at the beach,
so it's really hot.
Want more sunscreen?
I brought some in my purse!

Though...I left my purse in the
changing room locker...

I noticed the back of Rena's neck was
sunburned on the way back from
swimming in the ocean.
She got angry when I touched it...
I wanna try going to the beach at night!

I want to see the sea turtles laying
their eggs with my own eyes...
Even just once would be great!

I went to the beach with my family recently,
and my dad fished up a pufferfish!
It puffed right up...
It looked just like Rena when she's angry!
Wh-while I'm here, I should try and win it...
That jumbo-size Mocha Bunny in a yukata!

One play is 1000 yen, though...
I'm gonna be so nervous...
Hwhaaaaaa?!

I j-just saw it...!
A ghost came out of Endless Mirrors!!!
W-we need to get out of here!
My eyes played a trick on me?

So many cute summer prizes in the
crane games these days...

The plushies have things like
swim floats and starfish.
Starfish...
They're so cute moving around so slowly!

Pero can't regulate her own body heat,
so she can't go out in the summer sun.
That's why she's relaxing at home.

I made chilled Chinese noodles with the
cucumbers and tomatoes I grew at home!
Well, um, my mom made it...I helped her.
Ah! Look, look, fireworks!
They're so pretty!
The sound takes a while to catch up...

I guess the fireworks show must be
really far from here.
Hachi eats so much food, it's a real pain!

But there's lots of crickets about in summer,
so food is less of an issue.
I'm gonna catch a ton!

I went with Rena and Momoko to buy a
swimsuit, but Momoko worries so much
about her figure,

even though she's so slim and
doesn't need to!

Momoko and Rena are going off to
an idol concert today.
Maybe we can go somewhere fun, too?

I used to prefer staying at home to
playing with friends,

but now I love going out with
Momoko and Rena,
and Konomi's group, too!

Rena...
She's so busty, don't you think?
She is, right?!
I wonder what she eats to get like that...

You don't think it's because she loves
sweets, do you?
